definition[0]: the job and skill of persuading people to buy things
definition[1]: when people sell products, services, shares etc
example[1]: The dollar’s decline came amid hectic dollar selling in the Japanese currency market.
example[2]: In New York, dealers reportedheavy selling by investors from all around the world.
example[3]: Microsoft’sselling costs amounted to 33% of sales.
example[4]: A keen interest in selling is a requirement of the post.
example[5]: Production, sales, accounting and purchasing are all concerned with the making and selling of a product.
definition[2]: a best-selling, top-selling etc product is very successful and many people have bought it
example[6]: Until a few months ago, it was the best-selling PC in the US.
example[7]: Stephen King is already one of thetop-selling authors in publishing history.
definition[3]: a person or company paid to sell property, goods etc for a customer
example[8]: Viewing is by arrangement with the sole selling agents (=the only company involved in the sale of something, especially property).
